abstract: Jockey Victor Espinoza will ride long shot Whitmore in 2016 Kentucky Derby.
lead_paragraph: Espinoza, the jockey who won the Kentucky Derby with California Chrome in 2014 and with the eventual Triple Crown winner American Pharoah in 2015, landed aboard the long shot Whitmore.

headline.main: Victor Espinoza Gets Kentucky Derby Mount

snippet: Espinoza, the jockey who won the Kentucky Derby with California Chrome in 2014 and with the eventual Triple Crown winner American Pharoah in 2015, landed aboard the long shot Whitmore.
